document.full_text: shares in glencore international plc  fell as much as 3 percent on their hong kong debut on wednesday, with asian investors spooked by concerns over valuations and the outlook for commodities.
document.title: asian demand tepid as glencore makes lackluster hk debut
lines_and_colors: shares in glencore international plc  fell as much as 3 percent on their hong kong debut on wednesday, with asian investors spooked by concerns over valuations and the outlook for commodities.
